code: import React from'react';import'./QuickActions.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const QuickActions=()=>{const actions=[{id:1,title:'New Project',description:'Create a new project',icon:'📁',color:'#3b82f6',action:()=>console.log('New project clicked')},{id:2,title:'Add Task',description:'Create a new task',icon:'✅',color:'#10b981',action:()=>console.log('Add task clicked')},{id:3,title:'Invite Team',description:'Invite team members',icon:'👥',color:'#f59e0b',action:()=>console.log('Invite team clicked')},{id:4,title:'Schedule Meeting',description:'Schedule a team meeting',icon:'📅',color:'#8b5cf6',action:()=>console.log('Schedule meeting clicked')}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"quick-actions-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"quick-actions-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Quick Actions"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Get things done faster"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"actions-grid",children:actions.map((action,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:"action-button",onClick:action.action,style:{'--action-color':action.color,animationDelay:"".concat(index*100,"ms")},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"action-icon",style:{backgroundColor:action.color},children:action.icon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"action-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"action-title",children:action.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"action-description",children:action.description})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"action-arrow",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("svg",{width:"16",height:"16",viewBox:"0 0 24 24",fill:"none",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("path",{d:"M9 18l6-6-6-6",stroke:"currentColor",strokeWidth:"2",strokeLinecap:"round",strokeLinejoin:"round"})})})]},action.id))})]});};export default QuickActions;
